para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The figures in this section are Slim8n floor plans and general views, which illustrate the space required for installing the machine. Note that these layouts are for the Standard machine configuration and some of the key options. If the machine has special, new, customized options or has new specifications, please contact Makino for specific information.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;
